name: Richards/Carlberg
tagline: A Full Service Advertising and Marketing Firm.
description:
Richards/Carlberg was founded in 1971. Over the past 40+ years we’ve collected more creative awards than any other advertising agency in the area. More importantly, we’ve built powerful brands for our clients.
We are affiliated by common ownership with The Richards Group, America’s largest independent branding agency. Maintaining a relationship with a $1.3 billion agency allows us to tap into incredible resources – like best practices and a talented staff of nearly 700 bright advertising minds.
World-class creativity is the foundation for everything we do. In the end, we deliver inspiring ideas that work offline, online, anywhere.
